title: Are obtuse angles greater than right angles? - Quora

response.answer_text: Obtuse angles are greater than 90 deg or a right angle but less than 180 deg or 2 right angles. Reflex angles are greater than 180 deg or 2 right angles but less than 360 deg or 4 right angles. A triangle can have an obtuse but never a reflex angle. A quadrilateral can have an obtuse or a reflex angle.
